narrative:
*   This is a focused inspection limited to the one dog cited under veterinary care section 2.40 b 2 as a direct
noncompliance on the December 30, 2015 inspection report.  The dog ( microchip number 985121007730713 ) 
was examined by a licensed veterinarian on December 31, 2015.   Proper documentation was provided by the
licensee.
* The focused inspection and exit conference were conducted with the licensee, Dr. Margaret Shaver VMO and
Robert Bacon ACI.
Additional Inspectors
Shaver Margaret, Veterinary Medical Officer
